attributes.action: Stop the Labour Party stopping the local elections
attributes.additional_details: The government have no respect for its British ppl
attributes.background: I’d like the government removed for trying to stop the local elections, what part of Democracy don’t they understand !

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
